name: Lili's Memories
description:
Z, Q, S, D to move
Mouse to turn the camera & interact
----------------------------

Embody a man that just moved to his new place, but he needs to repair the house for it to be the most welcoming possible. Rumors are going on and about on the village about the previous owner, and you will have to find out what those are and discover more about your predecessor.
----------------------------

Lili's Memories is a game we made for the 2020th edition of the Global Game Jam with "repair" for theme.
